page.title: 13Housing
page.content: {4 Pound Cottages } The house is a ' 3 up 3 down',of the 3 bedrooms 2 face the main road and the other the back garden.The 3 rooms downstairs are a sitting room,a kitchen and a very small bathroom. The ceilings are of wattle except for the kitchen and sitting room which have been replastered,the walls are old stone with daub between.From the road the slate roof four windows and the front door surrounded by a small porch. Recently the kitchen has been extended, a shower installed and a large glass porch added to the back door. When the house was built there was a wooden shed on the end of the house which has since been replaced by a modern car port and an old shed at the botomn of the front garden which is
